title: The Jackson years: the new Americans
creator_credit: Dennis Azzarella and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Looks at Andrew Jackson’s life prior to his election to the US presidency in 1828. Uses Alexis de Tocqueville’s book, ‘Democracy in America’ and a stage play to highlight aspects of Jackson’s life, such as his duel with Dickenson; his days in the militia; and his eventual election as president.
